name: Dream Runner (Siam Hasan Udoy)
description:
A true Colorful Good Graphics Game for Android devices .
★ Infinity Run 
★ Parallel World Adventure
★ Colorful and HD Scene 
★ Awesome Alien World
★ Bangladesh Beauty
★ Awesome Asset 
Main character is a Girl . Her name is MARIA . She is upset with her life and running smashing everything she hates . Somehow she can visit parallel world through her dreams.

Powered by Unity .
Visit GameChangerCharity.org to help hospitalized Kids .

A Game By SIAM HASAN UDOY
